title: Executive Order 6277-Public Water Reserve No. 152, Colorado, Oregon, and Utah
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910 (ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847), as amended by the act of August 24, 1912 (ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497), it is hereby ordered that the land hereinafter listed be, and the same is hereby, withdrawn from settlement, location, sale, or entry, and reserved for public use in accordance with the provisions of section 10 of the act of December 29, 1916 (ch. 9, 39 Stat. 862, 865):
T. 9 N., R. 96 W., sec. 4, N½SW¼;
T. 10 N., R. 96 W., sec. 2, SW¼;
T. 11 N., R. 96 W., sec. 24, SE¼.
T. 7 N., R. 98 W., sec. 20, lots 3 and 4, SW¼NE¼, SE¼NW¼;
T. 19 S., R. 31 E., sec. 11, NW¼NW¼.
T. 3 S., R. 25 E., sec. 1, lots 2 and 3, SW¼NE¼, SE¼NW¼, W½SE¼;
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6277-Public Water Reserve No. 152, Colorado, Oregon, and Utah Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362100
